CustomField.description: Determines which fields (FirstName, LastName, and/or Email) V4S uses when matching Contacts against existing Contacts on Volunteers Sites pages. Use a semicolon-separated list, for example: FirstName;Email. Specify fields by their API Name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines which fields (FirstName, LastName, and/or Email) V4S uses when matching Contacts against existing Contacts on Volunteers Sites pages. Use a semicolon-separated list, for example: FirstName;Email. Specify fields by their API Name.
CustomField.label: Contact Matching Rule
